t: Amazon Premium Beauty Category: What is Premium Beauty? How do I join?
s: The term "premium" is used to distinguish these products from mass-market or drugstore beauty products. t: Merch by Amazon: POD T-Shirt Business Explained | EmpireFlippers
s: April 18, 2023 - The Merch by Amazon business model is a Print on Demand (POD) shirt service. A POD is where the product is only created when it is actually ordered. In this case, the shirt is only created when someone buys that shirt, thus it is printed ‚Äúon demand‚Äù and shipped to the customer.
